About me

About Me

Ever since I was a child, I have been fascinated by technology. From a very young age, I have been driven to innovate. My first exposure to software development was in my senior year of high school, and since then, I have continued to further my eduction in the field. I find joy in solving peoples' problems, and that is what a big part of software development is to me.

Tower
Node.js & Vue.js

Tower

Tower is an application I made for users to list and attend events. Events have tickets that consumers can 'purchase', marking them as an attendee for the event. It is the first full stack application that I created on my own, and I used Node.js for the back end, and Vue.js for the front end. For the database, I MongoDb, an open source NoSQL database management program.
